title: One Piece: Syrup Village Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
creator: Unknown
description: A comprehensive recap and review noting that the Syrup Village arc provides crucial character and ship introductions but has slow pacing and a somewhat unremarkable villain. Covers the 10-episode arc (Episodes 9-18) which adapts 20 manga chapters (Chapters 22-41).
